Content: Parliament met again at 1.00 p.m. today. Speaker Karu Jayasuriya informed the House on the new positions in Parliament. Sajith Premadasa was announced as the Opposition Leader, while the Chief Government Whip was Johnston Fernando. The Leader of the House is Dinesh Gunawardena and the Chief Opposition Whip is Gayantha Karunatilake. Waruna Priyantha Liyanage was sworn in as a new Member of Parliament of the Ratnapura District before the Speaker today. He fills the vacancy created following the death of MP Ranjith Soyza.
